item.title: Minimalist Plot Design
item.description: library(ggplot2) source("/Users/benjamin/Documents/R/ggplot_themes.R") setwd("/Users/benjamin/Documents/R/Experiments/ggplot-Labels") data <- read.csv("supreme_court_vacancies.csv", col.names=c("year", "wait")) str(data) ## 'data.frame': 103 obs. of 2 variables: ## $ year: int 1845 1792 1793 1795 1795 1795 1799 1800 1801 1803 ... ## $ wait: int 841 152 43 103 70 4 37 141 180 98 ... # We only want every other tick labelled xlabs <- seq(1780, 2020, by = 10) #S et out the full set of X-labels xlabs[seq(2,24,by=2)] <- "" # Blank out every other label, starting from the 2nd one # Insert caption caption <- "Note: Vacancies are counted as the number of days between a justice's death, retirement or resignation and the successor justice's swearing in (or commissioning in the case of a recess appointment) as a member of the court.
